extracted_playbook.title: Identify Top Exploited Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Review the list of top exploited vulnerabilities to determine which ones are applicable to your systems.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is there a patch available for the identified vulnerabilities?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Available Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install patches for the identified vulnerabilities to mitigate security risks.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult Additional Resources
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to additional resources and guidance for mitigating vulnerabilities without available patches.
